column1: The country Canada contains more than half of all the natural lakes in the world.
Saudi Arabia is the largest country on the Arabian Peninsula.
The South American country Chile accounts for more than half of the continent's western coastline.
The African nation with the most pyramids is Sudan.
The only continent with land in all four hemispheres is Africa.
The South American country Brazil is the continent's most populated nation.
In terms of land area, Russia is the largest country in the world.
